headline: Tracking William Nygren's Harris Associates Portfolio - Q1 2025 Update
summary: Harris Associates' Q1 2025 portfolio shifts reveal major stake changes in top stocks like ConocoPhillips and Airbnb.

headline: How Stablecoins Can Be Destabilizing
summary: Stablecoins’ going mainstream wouldn’t take all of banks’ deposits away.  The Senate looks set to soon pass the so-called Genius Act, which will set guidelines for issuers of stablecoins—digital tokens that are fully backed by fiat currencies such as dollars.  One big debate over the wisdom of giving stablecoins a regulatory framework centers around how they would affect the current banking system if they were to hugely expand in size.
